message.body: I'm guessing you guys weren't planning to stop by anyway, but if you were, I must warn you off. I've picked up some kind of evil chest cold. Have a fun trip!
Don't worry about it. I'll see you guys some other time, when I'm not shedding infectious particles!
I'll hit you up when we are en route and go from there
OK we are planning to stop by unless you're suck and wanna be left alone
Well if you're going to tell me I suck then you can go to hell! Jk, had to make fun of the autocorrect goof. If you're sure you want to risk getting sick, okay.
Any idea about what time you'd be rolling in?
The g maps directions are good. Send me a text or call me when you're getting off 95
Will be there by 3am. Is that OK or too late?
I'll just catch some Zs until then. Any major changes to the plan, give me a call. Have a safe trip.
Okee dokee. Thanks. See ya in a bit
